pages.text: The $(item)Wind Chime$() is an Instrument that will wave in the wind and periodically produce Melody by itself. It must be hanging from a block above it, and it cannot have any blocks below it. Often, Wind Chimes can be seen hanging from branches of leaves, which makes them release more Melody.

While the Wind Chime does not create a large amount of Melody, it does not require any intervention by players. Because the music from the Wind Chime is so easy to come by, its $(l:basics/music)Melody Threshold$() is easily reached.$(br2)It is recommended that only a couple of Wind Chimes hang near a Totem Pole at once.
